ingredients.item: 395g can essential Waitrose Mixed Beans in Spicy Tomato Sauce (or 400g can essential Waitrose Red Kidney Beans in Water, drained)

instructions.step: Place the couscous in a large bowl, pour in the hot stock, cover with clingfilm and leave for 5 minutes while you cook the spinach.
Wilt the spinach for 2-3 minutes according to pack instructions, then drain off the excess liquid.
Heat the beans in a pan for 1-2 minutes. Fluff the couscous with a fork and stir in the spinach and beans.
